short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: We'll help you to rise quality of emails.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 Unlock the full potential of your Gmail with "ChatGPT Gmail Reading Helper", an innovative Chrome extension powered by OpenAI. This tool revolutionizes your Gmail experience, allowing you to craft custom instructions or harness pre-set ones, enabling you to engage with your emails in new and meaningful ways. Streamline productivity, amplify comprehension, and fine-tune your Gmail experience.

🔥 Key Features:

🧠 Dynamic OpenAI Integration:
Design custom instructions to fetch distinct insights or actions.
Harness our ready-made instructions or modify them to suit your needs.

✉️ Instant Email Summarization:
Receive concise summaries of extensive emails with a mere command.

🌐 On-the-fly Email Translation:
Seamlessly interpret emails from any language with a translation command.

💡 Adaptive Reply Suggestions:
Benefit from AI's unique reply ideas, tailored to your instructions or our suggested ones.

🔍 In-depth Sender Details:
Acquire in-depth insights into the sender with just one command.

🌌 Endless Possibilities:
With the prowess of OpenAI, you're not confined to just our recommendations. Shape the AI's functions by creating your distinct instructions or fine-tuning the pre-existing ones.

🔒 Privacy is Our Priority:
Your confidentiality is paramount. All data dispatched to OpenAI undergoes rigorous processing, ensuring utmost privacy. We pledge zero retention or storage of your email content.
